Text: ok, need a little help here since im new to reading comics...what program(s) to i need to read these .cbr and cbz and whatever else?  thanks...
unrared, this DarkHorse series of Conan books contains 2,019 files in 119 folders, 1.71 GB, in fantastic artwork, running virus and spy free.  many thanks for this upload....

Great set, nice quality. But I was wondering if anyone has a copy of issues 36 and 37 with the letter column intact? The copies in this set are missing the letters and the Two-Gun Bob strip. Otherwise, great stuff.
